page.title: 16My House By Edward Wright
page.content: My house was built in about{1900.}It has a hall, kitchen, cellar, dining room, lounge, bathroom, three bedrooms and an attic bedroom, which I share with my brother. My house is built of stone with a grey slate roof and bay windows. My Mum and Dad have owned the house for fourteen years. The family who owned it before us were Dr. and Mrs Flint and their two daughters who owned it from 1951 to 1971. Mr. and Mrs. Thomson lived here in about 1940 and a Mr. Dawes owned the house after her. Mr. Davies was gassed in his sleep when a boulder rolled down from the hill side and broke a gas pipe that led to the house. The garage was used as a{undertakers}and a {joiners}by Mr. Herbert Wragg until about 1930. On the drive there was a hut where the joiner kept his wood.
